BASIC_GIT.title: git init
BASIC_GIT.description: Initializes a new Git repository in the current directory.

BASIC_GIT.title: git clone <repo_url>
BASIC_GIT.description: Clones a repository from a remote URL to your local machine.

BASIC_GIT.title: git status
BASIC_GIT.description: Shows the working directory status (modified, staged, untracked files).

BASIC_GIT.title: git add <file>
BASIC_GIT.description: Stages a file or files to be committed.

BASIC_GIT.title: git commit -m "message"
BASIC_GIT.description: Commits staged changes to the local repository with a message.

BASIC_GIT.title: git push
BASIC_GIT.description: Pushes committed changes to the remote repository.

BASIC_GIT.title: git pull
BASIC_GIT.description: Fetches and merges changes from the remote repository into the local branch.

BASIC_GIT.title: git fetch
BASIC_GIT.description: Downloads objects and references from a remote repository without merging.

BASIC_GIT.title: git merge <branch_name>
BASIC_GIT.description: Merges changes from the specified branch into the current branch.

BASIC_GIT.title: git log
BASIC_GIT.description: Displays the commit history of the repository.

BASIC_GIT.title: git diff
BASIC_GIT.description: Shows differences between the working directory and staged changes.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git branch
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Lists all branches in the repository.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git checkout -b <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Creates a new branch and switches to it.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git merge <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Merges the specified branch into the current branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git rebase <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Reapplies commits from one branch onto another branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git branch -D <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Force deletes the specified local branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git remote set-head origin <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Sets the default branch for the remote repository.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git remote -v
REMOTE_GIT.description: Shows the URLs of remote repositories.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git push origin <branch_name>
REMOTE_GIT.description: Pushes the specified branch to the remote repository.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git push -u origin <branch_name>
REMOTE_GIT.description: Pushes a branch to the remote repository and sets the upstream.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git pull origin <branch_name>
REMOTE_GIT.description: Fetches and merges the specified branch from the remote repository.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git fetch origin
REMOTE_GIT.description: Downloads objects and references from the remote repository without merging.

REMOTE_GIT.title: git remote show origin
REMOTE_GIT.description: Displays detailed information about the remote repository.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git add .
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Stages all modified files in the working directory.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git add -A
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Stages all changes including file deletions.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git reset
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Unstages a file (reverts it to the working directory).

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git reset <file>
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Removes a file from the staging area while keeping its changes in the working directory.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git commit -m "message"
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Commits staged changes to the local repository with a message.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git commit --amend
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Modifies the most recent commit (message or content).

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git commit --all
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Automatically stages tracked files and commits them.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git commit -a
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Stages and commits all tracked modified files.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git commit --no-verify
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Commits changes without running pre-commit hooks.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git reset --soft HEAD~1
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Moves HEAD back one commit and keeps changes staged.

STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.title: git reset --hard HEAD~1
STAGING_AND_COMMITTING.description: Moves HEAD back one commit and discards all changes.
